verses.verse: At that <S%H6256>time,<s%> Merodach <S%H1081>Baladan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1081>Baladan,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> and a <S%H4503>present<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah;<s%> for he <S%H8085>heard<s%> that he had been <S%H2470>sick,<s%> and had <S%H2388>recovered.<s%>

<S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> was <S%H8055>pleased<s%> with <S%H7200>them,<s%> and showed them the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his precious <S%H5238>things,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> the <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> and all that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H214>treasures.<s%> There was <S%H1697>nothing<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> nor in all his <S%H4475>dominion,<s%> that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H7200>didn't<s%> show them.

Then <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> and <S%H559>asked<s%> <S%H582>him,<s%> "What did these men <S%H559>say?<s%> <S%H370>Where<s%> did they <S%H935>come<s%> from to <S%H2396>you?<s%>" Hezekiah <S%H559>said,<s%> "They have <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H894>me,<s%> even from Babylon."

Then he <S%H559>asked,<s%> "What have they <S%H7200>seen<s%> in your <S%H1004>house?<s%>" <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> "They have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that is in my <S%H1004>house.<s%> There is <S%H1697>nothing<s%> among my <S%H214>treasures<s%> that I have not shown <S%H7200>them.<s%>"

<S%H3117><s%> 'Behold, the days are <S%H935>coming<s%> when all that is in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and that which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H686>stored<s%> up until this <S%H3117>day,<s%> will be <S%H5375>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%> <S%H1697>Nothing<s%> will be <S%H3498>left,<s%>' <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3947><s%> 'They will take away your <S%H1121>sons<s%> who will <S%H3318>issue<s%> from <S%H3205>you,<s%> whom you shall father, and they will be <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H1964>palace.<s%>'"

Then <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1697>word<s%> which you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%>" He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7965>moreover,<s%> "For there will be peace and <S%H571>truth<s%> in my <S%H3117>days.<s%>"
